p: The EOs of clove ( Syzygium aromaticum (L.) Merill & Perry, Batch number: E0971/1211), cinnamon bark ( Cinnamomum zeylanicum Nees., Batch number: A6302/0909), eucalyptus ( Eucalyptus globulus Labill., Batch number: G1452/1404), thyme ( Thymus vulgaris L., Batch number: E8392/1308), scots pine ( Pinus sylvestris L., Batch number: G3032/1406), peppermint ( Mentha Ã— piperita L., Batch number: E7421/1307), and citronella ( Cymbopogon nardus (L.) Rendle, Batch number: G3531/1407) were obtained from Aromax Ltd. (Budapest, Hungary).
